comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: All those will appear at some point in the future. There’s a old tracking issue for this; managed to find a handful of icons from that list too.

comments.author: UnknownFreak.2805
comments.body:

HoT

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Oof, I forgot to add it to the hardcoded list. It’ll appear as “map_crafting_scribe” in either the next release or the one after. Sorry about that! :<

comments.author: UnknownFreak.2805
comments.body: Just wanted to point out that there is no scribe icon in the v2/files list, every other crafting discipline has it. Did someone forget to add it in the list? or is it intentional?
